SELECT CEIL(year(now()) - if(length(identity_number)=18,substring(identity_number,7,4),if(length(identity_number)=15,concat('19',substring(identity_number,7,2)),null))) as age, count(1) as totalCount from user inner join account on user.login_name = account.login_name
and DATE_FORMAT(user.register_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and exists(select 1 from invest join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = user.login_name and invest.status = 'SUCCESS' and loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE') group by age order by totalCount asc
